ru.jango.j0loader.image.cache

Class LRUCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.jango.j0loader.image.cache.DefaultCache
      • ru.jango.j0loader.image.cache.LRUCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache

    public class LRUCache
extends DefaultCache
    Special wrapper for android.support.v4.util.LruCache. That is also memory cache, but with smarter algorithm.

    Disk LRU cache incoming: http://developer.android.com/training/displaying-bitmaps/cache-bitmap.html#disk-cache

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public boolean put(java.net.URI uri,
          byte[] raw)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Adds a chunk of data into cache. Also checks cache size limits before adding. Method is called just after processing (loading and scaling) of next queue element.
        Specified by:
        put in interface Cache
        Overrides:
        put in class DefaultCache
        Parameters:
        uri - key URI to retrieve data later
        raw - an image compressed into a byte array
        Returns:
        TRUE if an data was put into cache; FALSE if cache is full - max cache size was reached

      • get

        public byte[] get(java.net.URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Pulls an image data from the cache, if it was previously cached. Method is called when loading from cache.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Cache
        Overrides:
        get in class DefaultCache
        Returns:
        previously cached image data, or NULL
        See Also:
        BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(byte[], int, int)

      • remove

        public byte[] remove(java.net.URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Removes an image from cache.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Cache
        Overrides:
        remove in class DefaultCache
        Returns:
        just removed image data, or NULL

      • isCached

        public boolean isCached(java.net.URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Checks if an image was previously cached. Method is called to find out what loading should be performed: loading from cache, or from URI.
        Specified by:
        isCached in interface Cache
        Overrides:
